# library	 rapidjson
add_library(rapidjson INTERFACE)

# include
target_include_directories(rapidjson
	INTERFACE
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
	)

# definitions
target_compile_definitions(rapidjson
	INTERFACE
		-DRAPIDJSON_HAS_STDSTRING
		-DRAPIDJSON_SSE2
		-DRAPIDJSON_48BITPOINTER_OPTIMIZATION=0
	)
